discourse_list.title: Thread on Importance of establishing executive function rather than trying to make every decision by token vote

content.content: See this twitter thread- very valuable read about some of the unrealistic expectations around token voting.  We see many of these issues in our own votes today.  These points are why I strongly favor vote delegation and enabling dedicated people to make decisions rather than having so many token votes on every small change.
content.GPT-summary: The author of the post is explaining the importance of establishing executive function instead of relying on token voting for every decision. The post also refers to a Twitter thread that highlights the unrealistic expectations around token voting. A 3rd party is giving constructive criticism of the proposal by pointing out the issues with token voting and advocating for vote delegation.
GPT-discussion-categories: Author of proposal is explaining proposal

content.content: This topic was automatically closed 91 days after the last reply. New replies are no longer allowed.
